title: (x) Underline your Business Gifts/Font Package Details - FF Dax/FF Fago {Yves/Dav}
content:
Please tell me if you know this font's name.  
 It's a little similar to Neo.

Thank you.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [fontul.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20110703012737/http:/typophile.com/files/fontul.jpg) | 91.47 KB |
author: ibarbar

comments.content:
"The inescapable FF Dax."

Brown Ink--and it wasn't even shipped via UPS :-)

ChrisL

Thank you. Do you know any similar (even by far) fonts to FF Dax ?

Thanks again.

' [Kaffeesatz](http://web.archive.org/web/20110703012737/http:/www.yanone.de/schriftgestaltung/kaffeesatz/)', by Jan Gerner, may be a _( free )_ alternate to 'Dax'..

_Edit-A-Bit.: Ooh, And, Can you define 'similar, even by far' any more.? :)_

Dav, [formlos](http://web.archive.org/web/20110703012737/http:/www.formlos.net/)
Theirry. What is the story with this font? Is this legit?
Interesting. They have paypal linked. Treating it as shareware.

Thanks, Thierry _( kesh )_, for the corrected link.. _It seems I messed mine up.. :) Sorry.._

Other fine alternates may be the almost brandnew ' [Elektra](http://web.archive.org/web/20110703012737/http:/www.stormtype.com/elektra.html)', by František Štorm, and ' [Mr Giacco](http://web.archive.org/web/20110703012737/http:/www.sudtipos.com/fonts-giacco.htm)', by Diego Giacco..

Dav, [formlos](http://web.archive.org/web/20110703012737/http:/www.formlos.net/)

Thank you again.  
 Elektra looks really nice.

Here's another one that I don't know what it is.  
 Thanks in advance :)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110703012737im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font_package_detail.gif)

Maybe you should start seperate threads for seperate ID requests.?

Anyway, This may be 'Fago _( Office, Sans )_'..  
_( Edit-A-Bit.: If you are questioning similar site related images on FontShop, I think you can be pretty sure that the used typeface would be a FontFont.. :)_

Dav, [formlos](http://web.archive.org/web/20110703012737/http:/www.formlos.net/)
Yep it's Fago Condensed Bold. Thanks.
